title: Was Bernice King’s Tweet on MLK Day Flagged as Misinfo by Instagram?
subtitle: King tweeted about how her father “was one of the most hated men in America.”
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Instagram flagged a reposted tweet from Bernice King about her father, the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr., on Jan. 18, 2021, which is MLK Day, for misinformation pertaining to the COVID-19 vaccine.
